definition: (of a liquid or gas) to leak/to divulge (a secret)/to leak
to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)
lit. mysteries of heaven must not be revealed (idiom); must not be revealed/I am not at liberty to inform you.
pinyin: tian1 ji1 bu4 ke3 xie4 lou4

definition: to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret/to let the cat out of the bag

sentences.english: Adamaged or leaking battery should not be transported.
sentences.chinese: 已损坏或泄漏的电池不能予以运输。

sentences.english: The indirect fume temperature regulator can save energy consumption and water consumption and solve the problem of gas leakage.
sentences.chinese: 本发明能节约能耗，水耗，并能避免煤气泄漏的问题。

sentences.english: The other is to form'core-shell'structure that releases the static charge.
sentences.chinese: 形成所谓的“芯壳结构”来泄漏静电荷。

sentences.english: The statesman is ostracize because he betray many top secrets.
sentences.chinese: 那个政治家因泄漏许多国家最高机密而被放逐。

sentences.english: Among all kinds of fuel-spilled-fires, pool fire under windy conditions is the most common one.
sentences.chinese: 典型的燃油泄漏火灾多是有风条件下的液态池火燃烧。

sentences.english: This facility generates a second heap dump after enough memory leakage.
sentences.chinese: 此工具可在足够的内存泄漏之后生成一个第二堆转储。

sentences.english: Shell has still not been able to say why the leak occurred in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌仍未能说清为何泄漏在第一处发生。

sentences.english: If the references weren't weak, the application would have a memory leak.
sentences.chinese: 如果引用不弱，那么应用程序会有内存泄漏。

sentences.english: As for Sister Kathleen and your parents? Not a single word to them.
sentences.chinese: 不要对凯瑟琳嬷嬷和你的父母泄漏一个字。

sentences.english: Tepco and the safety agency say the exact source of the leak is unknown.
sentences.chinese: 东京电力和安全机构人士说，泄漏的确切来源不明。

sentences.english: An initial investigation showed a gas leak from a pipeline going through the plant at Qixia District triggered the blast at about 10:10 am.
sentences.chinese: 初步调查显示，爆炸由管道燃气泄漏引发。

sentences.english: What is whom you are compared to really all limpid , is a secret because of sound has been disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 什么是真的你比谁都清晰，是因为声音泄漏了天机。

sentences.english: The worst-case accident would be enormous releases of radioactivity.
sentences.chinese: 最糟糕的情况要数放射性物质的大量泄漏。

sentences.english: Leak testing is recommended for flexible endoscopes before immersion.
sentences.chinese: 在浸泡前建议对软式内镜进行泄漏试验。

sentences.english: Leakage of hydraulic oil pollutes industrial lubrication oil and surface of aluminium strip and foil.
sentences.chinese: 液压油的泄漏会污染工艺润滑油及铝带箔表面。

sentences.english: Once occurring fire in the plant, pyrophoric material leaks must be minimized for their consequences mitigated.
sentences.chinese: 当火情发生时，一定要减少化学品的泄漏以减少损失。

definition: to leak out/to release (liquid or gas)
to expose/to reveal/to lay bare/also pr. [pu4 lu4]
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
meltdown/(of nuclear fuel) to melt down
